article_title: In Italy, de Blasio Digs In With Gusto
article_text:
GRASSANO, Italy—Mangia, mangia, Mr. Mayor.

Bill de Blasio and his family have been eating their way through Italy—and that's just fine with them.

"We liked pretty much everything," said Mr. de Blasio, discussing the family's meals during...
